text:
The photo is of shhk signboard. Code choice: mostly in English, two advertisements almost completely in mandarin simplified Chinese. I can presume that is for the Chinese studies majors. One has a slightly more calligraphic font. The ads consist of recreational activities by the school clubs, career or academic advancement advice, and volunteering opportunities. They do not seem to be organised in any particular way. There are some accompanying graphics in some of them. In the case of ‘wugful fiesta’
it gives insight of what the activity might be? It might be something like a game of scrabble but I can only guess. The signboard is positioned near the lift. Nice place to sit and have executive dysfunction.
It's a school building... With a Liho (cheese, yucks) bubble tea shop inside. Huge, cool open space in the sheltered quadrangle is suitable for many kinds of student activities and studying.
This building is for SoH+SSS professors to build their office only. Give us a real school. Gaia is so great but it's not for us.
Go on a Sunday when the place is empty. You will have the place to yourself and maybe a few others who are snapping away pictures
